original_text: The man said, ‘Daniel, God loves you very much. Listen carefully to what I say to you. Stand up now, because God has sent me to you.’ When he said this, I stood up. But my body was still shaking.
korean_text: 내게 이르되 큰 은총을 받은 사람 다니엘아 내가 네게 이르는 말을 깨닫고 일어서라 내가 네게 보내심을 받았느니라 하더라 그가 내게 이 말을 한 후에 내가 떨며 일어서니

sentences.original_text: Daniel, God loves you very much
Listen carefully to what I say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 하는 말을 주의 깊게 들으세요

sentences.original_text: because God has sent me to you
But my body was still shaking
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내 몸은 아직도 떨리고 있었습니다
